description:
This wordprocessor does what M$Word does now AND it still does all that M$Word could once do but no longer can. It will be immediately useable and liked by M$Word users, yet it is also subtly different, in interesting and user-efficient ways. 

I strongly recommend this program.
En lo particular me gusta mucho, la apariencia recuerda mucho al office, muy estable y muy compatible.
